definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: tong2 xing4 lian4 kong3 ju4 zheng4

definition: like polarities repel each other/(fig.) like repels like

sentences.chinese: 但是王先生也是同性恋者。

sentences.english: Examples of demonization of homosexuality is not unique in history.
sentences.chinese: 将同性恋妖魔化的事例在历史上并非绝无仅有。

sentences.english: Lesbian- and gay-parented households as well as single adoptive parents were usually left out.
sentences.chinese: 而同性恋家庭和单身养父母常被遗漏。

sentences.english: The results of the isotropic model are better than that of modified Cam-clay.
sentences.chinese: 对比计算结果说明各向同性模型优于修正剑桥模型。

sentences.english: Are extremely handsome men really more likely to be gay?
sentences.chinese: 非常英俊的男人真的更可能是同性恋吗？

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨手术矫正小儿共同性内斜视的远期疗效。

sentences.english: Do you have a lesbian in your life?
sentences.chinese: 你生命中是否有女同性恋者？

sentences.english: Wilde went on to become homosexual worship the "ancestral."
sentences.chinese: 王尔德甚至成了同性恋者顶礼膜拜的“祖师爷”。

sentences.english: We have a ban on the propaganda of homosexuality and paedophilia.
sentences.chinese: 我们禁止对于同性恋和恋童癖的宣传。

sentences.english: But in the face of homosexuality wooer, female showed remarkably higher percentage of rejection than male.
sentences.chinese: 但对同性恋的求爱，女生拒绝的比例明显高于男生。

sentences.english: Student: Either that or a homosexual.
sentences.chinese: 学生，或是那种情况，或是同性恋。

sentences.english: Last week she ordered a halt to all dismissals of gay service members.
sentences.chinese: 上周，该法官下令暂停解雇所有同性恋服役人员。

sentences.english: Connor: No, by being more gay-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 应该说是以对同性恋友好的方式。

sentences.english: Scientists have shown that homosexuality is an orientationthat is unalterable.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经证明，同性恋是不可改变的一种倾向。

sentences.english: The other effectively allowing same-sex marriage in the state of California.
sentences.chinese: 二是切实有效地允许在加利福尼亚的同性婚姻。

sentences.english: I lived as a gay, wanted to be straight, decided to be bixesual, and finally got married, but was never faithful.
sentences.chinese: 我像同性恋那样生活也想变直，就决定做个双性恋。

definition: the opposite sex/of the opposite sex/heterosexual/different in nature
to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
